name: Vaccination Credential
description: A form to be used for verifiable COVID-19 vaccination credentials for basic interoperability

attr_information.disease: Information about past infection|Disease or agent|Classification of Disease
attr_information.doseNumber: Vaccination/prophylaxis information|Number of dose administered in a cycle
attr_information.dosesPerCycle: Vaccination/prophylaxis information|Number of expected doses for a complete cycle
attr_information.stateOfVaccination: Vaccination/prophylaxis information|Province or territory of vaccination
